'''Iridescent Splendor''' is an [[Login Event]] in [[Version 3.4]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/02/05 00:00 – 2023/03/01 05:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in to the game to receive Intertwined Fates, Fragile Resin, and other rewards!
* Each {{sic|email|expected = mail}} can be collected until the end of the event.
